The World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) was established in 1994 by Web inventor Tim Berners-Lee, to develop interoperable standards to lead the Web to its full potential.

We are an international multi-stakeholder community where member organizations, a full-time staff, and the public work together to build a Web based on the principles of accessibility, internationalization, privacy and security.

Please be more curious than critical. Your interactions go to real people who care and do their best 🙏

note:
9 o'clock #HashtagGames hosted by @paul

One game, every evening.

How to play:
1. Write something awesome
2. Use the Hashtag
3. Toot/Post
4. Repeat

Follow the #HashtagGames hashtag, if you like

Feel free private toot your game ideals and we will get back to you.

Please include #HashtagGames along with the night's game play tag so non-players can mute their timelines of the awesome game play noise from the games

To see previous games, click Media in our profile

note:
He/him. #SRE, systems architect, all around #ops kinda person. This is my 3rd or 4th Eternal September. (My first time as cattle, though.) I miss Diaspora*.

Alt text is fun. Or at least, mine often is.

Even though I don't work in #embedded, once upon a time I #hacked Tivos, then helped make #Linux work on #WinCE #PDAs, and I was even there for the early days of #AOSP.

#IRC is better than #Discord. #Stalebot is a robotic receptionist for projects that look down on their users and don't want to be bothered by the "unwashed masses"

Recently I've started growing #cannabis and experimenting with #hydroponics, so expect pictures of plants and occasional 420-influenced posts.

Moved over to #Firefish because "no algorithm" shouldn't mean "no feed" or "thick bubble".. It isn't working, but direct follows is helping.

As you read this, I may still be the middle of Going Through some SH!T and while it will usually be CW, it won't always be fun. We can all hope this message is outdated, but if that is a concern for you please be warned now.

I try to #cw when it is bad and #alttext when it is pictures, but I'm not perfect. If that is concerning, let me know.

#nobots #nobridge
